Shape classes
===============

All of the shapes that can be instantiated are a concrete subclass of the ```Object``` abstract base class. The subclasses (hereafter 'shapes')
are listed below. Note that while the constructor format is the same for each of the subclasses

Object class
~~~~~~~~~~~~
.. automodule:: object
   :members:
   :special-members:
   :private-members:



Concrete subclasses class
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Cylinder
---------
.. automodule:: cylinder
   :members:
   :special-members:
   :private-members:


Sphere
---------
.. automodule:: sphere
   :members:
   :special-members:
   :private-members:
